txt.en: Gladion's anguish is severe. It is best that you return to DÃ­nadab....
'Please hurry, [placeholder], and fetch the healer! She can be found on the other end of the village. Hurry!'
Hebil stands over Fuirion in the middle of the corsairs' encampment.\n\nYou should speak with Hebil.
Hebil stands over Fuirion in the middle of the corsairs' encampment.
Defend yourself against the attacking Corsairs.
Fuirion's life hangs on a thread, and Hebil, a cruel Corsair captain, stands in the way of his rescue.
Defend yourself against the attacking Corsairs
Gladion is at the Corsair encampment in northern Lamedon.\n\nYou should speak with Gladion.
'No, no, Fuirion, my brother.... His wounds were too much, he was too weak!'

'Can't you see this fool has a death wish? I will see that his wish is granted. Every so often he murmurs about some woman, some great love, I am sure. \qLimril, Limril,\q he calls. Is he a spurned lover? It does not matter to me. It is a death sentence to walk into this camp, as you will both soon find out.'
Instance: A Life Hangs on a Thread
